content: introduction hello my name s anna fores i m a fan of amigurumi and i m the author of this pattern the pattern doesn t include any crochet tutorial lessons if you publish on the internet any photo with the toy made by this pattern please mention me as the author of the pattern and don t forget to mention my ig account @annaforespatterns #pattern_annafores the pattern is my authorial work the pattern is only for personal use it s prohibited to sell present or distribute the pattern any other way thanks for understanding and respecting my work enjoy the process and have a nice day сopyright 2021 @annaforespatterns all rights reserved materials  white yarn alize cotton gold color 55 330m/100g 55% cotton 45 acryl  black yarn alize cotton gold color 60 330m/100g 55% cotton 45 acryl  yellow yarn yarnart jeans color 33 160m/50g 55% cotton 45 acryl  threads for face embroidery black white and pink colors  eyes 6 mm  hook suitable for the chosen yarn i ve used 2 25  needle  fiberfill abbreviations in this pattern we use usa terminology level of difficulty beginner magic_ring magic_ring r row single_crochet single_crochet increase invisible increase decrease invisible decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch st stitch … * - repeat required number of stitches in brackets arms make 2 yellow color do not stuff 1 6 into magic_ring 2 6 increase 12 3-4 12 single_crochet 2 r changing the color to black invisible color change 5-8 12 single_crochet 4 r changing the color to yellow invisible color change 9-12 12 single_crochet 4 r changing the color to black invisible color change 13-16 12 single_crochet 4 r fold the arms in half and crochet 6 single_crochet through both layers secure the thread leave a long tail for sewing legs make 2 black color 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 2 1 single_crochet increase *3 9 3 9 single_crochet 4 2sc increase *3 12 5-6 12 single_crochet 2 r 7 3sc increase *3 15 8-9 15 single_crochet 2 r 10 4sc increase *3 18 11-12 18 single_crochet 2 r fix and cut the thread of one leg but continue to work with the thread of the 2nd leg 2 сopyright 2021 @annaforespatterns all rights reserved body continue to work 3 chain slip_stitch in single_crochet the 1st leg 13 18 single_crochet on the 1st leg 3 single_crochet in chain 18 single_crochet on the 2nd leg 3 single_crochet in chain 42 14 42 single_crochet changing the color to yellow invisible color change fill the body with fiberfill 15 6 single_crochet increase *6 48 16-17 48 single_crochet 2 r 18 7 single_crochet increase *6 54 changing the color to black invisible color change 19-21 54 single_crochet 3 r 22 7 single_crochet decrease *6 48 changing the color to yellow invisible color change 23-24 48 single_crochet 2 r 25 6 single_crochet decrease *6 42 26 42 single_crochet changing the color to black invisible color change 27 5 single_crochet decrease *6 36 28 36 single_crochet
